name: Cave of the Hot Lava Monster
name_original: Cave of the Hot Lava Monster
description:
My Game Design Foundations Final Project. A platformer where you really shouldn't touch the floor so much. Made in Game Maker Studio.

  • Original Game Concept: Hughe V.
  • Level/Gameplay Designer: Hughe V.
  • Programming: Christopher Smith, Hughe V.
  • Art: Megan Muir, Hughe V., Various
  • Music/Sound Design: Hughe V.
  • Outside Resources:
    • http://www.bfxr.net/ (Sound Effects)
    • http://opengameart.org/content/dirt-platformer-til... (Lanea Zimmerman)
    • http://opengameart.org/content/wood-texture-tiles (JCW)
    • http://opengameart.org/content/backgrounds-for-2d-... (Zeyu Ren)
    • http://gmc.yoyogames.com/index.php?showtopic=53176... (Muhammad Kamal)
    • http://opengameart.org/content/basic-boulder (MystiqMiu)
    • http://opengameart.org/content/large-bubble-and-so... (Julien Jorge)
